org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: RegimenAnalysisActiveTXNEW
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Number of Patients Newly Started on Treatment by Regimen
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT
linelist.regimenlinetext RegimenLine, linelist.regimentext Regimen, SUM(IF(ageless1=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male<1`, SUM(IF(ageless1=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female<1`, SUM(IF(age1to4=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 1-4`, SUM(IF(age1to4=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 1-4`, SUM(IF(age5to9=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 5-9`, SUM(IF(age5to9=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 5-9`,
SUM(IF(age10to14=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 10-14`, SUM(IF(age10to14=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 10-14`,
SUM(IF(age15to19=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 15-19`, SUM(IF(age15to19=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 15-19`, SUM(IF(age20to24=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 20-24`, SUM(IF(age20to24=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 20-24`, SUM(IF(age25to29=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 25-29`, SUM(IF(age25to29=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 25-29`, SUM(IF(age30to34=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 30-34`, SUM(IF(age30to34=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 30-34`, SUM(IF(age35to39=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 35-34`, SUM(IF(age35to39=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 39-34`, SUM(IF(age40to44=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 40-44`, SUM(IF(age40to44=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 40-44`, SUM(IF(age45to49=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 45-49`, SUM(IF(age45to49=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 45-49`, SUM(IF(age50above=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 50+`, SUM(IF(age50above=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 50+`, SUM(IF(linelist.regimenlinecoded,1,0)) as `Total`
from
(
select
patient.patient_id,
person.gender as sex,
@age:=TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,:endDate) as age,
IF(@age<1,1,0) as ageless1, IF(@age BETWEEN 1 AND 4,1,0) as age1to4, IF(@age BETWEEN 5 AND 9,1,0) as age5to9, IF(@age BETWEEN 10 AND 14,1,0) as age10to14, IF(@age BETWEEN 15 AND 19,1,0) as age15to19, IF(@age BETWEEN 20 AND 24,1,0) as age20to24, IF(@age BETWEEN 25 AND 29,1,0) as age25to29, IF(@age BETWEEN 30 AND 34,1,0) as age30to34, IF(@age BETWEEN 35 AND 39,1,0) as age35to39, IF(@age BETWEEN 40 AND 44,1,0) as age40to44, IF(@age BETWEEN 45 AND 49,1,0) as age45to49, IF(@age >=50,1,0) as age50above,
getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as regimenlinetext,
getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as regimenlinecoded,
getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,160540,23,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as careentrypointcoded,
getcurrentregimen(getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))),getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))) as regimentext,
getcodedintvalueobs(
getobswithencounterid( getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) ,getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))))) as regimencoded, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as lastpickupdate,
getdatevalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,159599,curdate())) as artstartdate,
IFNULL (getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165470,13,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))),getoutcome( getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))), getconceptval(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
)) as statustext
from patient INNER JOIN person on(person.person_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) WHERE patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier IS NOT NULL ) as linelist where linelist.artstartdate BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate and linelist.careentrypointcoded!=160563 GROUP BY linelist.regimenlinecoded,linelist.regimencoded;
